ProjectTitle: Toward improved translatability of animal research: Developing advanced social behavior tests in rats to assess microRNA depletion as a novel treatment target for the core social symptoms of Autism Spectrum Disorder.
InitialFeedbackHistory:
18/06/2024
You have only included the data management information from the grant application.

Now that your research has started, please complete a full data management plan using the template that FWO expects. You can write this in dmponline.be or the FWO template. You can certainly include the information you already describe, and then further complete the additional questions in the template. 

Instructions here: https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/guidance/dmp/dmp
